channel.title: Rest orb help

item.title: Rest orb help
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

ok so i managed to accomplished right click resting by myself…
now the resting orbs doesn’t show up? (Music orb)

any help?
here’s the code i have made

public void drawRestOrb(){ String OD = signlink.findcachedir()+"/Sprites/Gameframe/Orbs/"; String cEn = RSInterface.interfaceCache[149].disabledMessage; cEn = cEn.replaceAll("%",""); int currentEner = Integer.parseInt(cEn); energy = (int)(((double)currentEner / 100) * 100D); ORBS[0] = new Sprite(OD+"ORBS 0.PNG", 27, getOrbFill(energy)); if(!musicOrb && restOrb){ if(!is480){ if(restOrb){ ORBS[7].drawSprite(190, 92); } else{ ORBS[1].drawSprite(190, 92); } } else { ORBS[14].drawSprite(190, 92); } ORBS[10].drawSprite(193, 95); if(energy != 100){ ORBS[0].drawSprite(193, 95); } ORBS[13].drawSprite(199, 100); } else { if(!is480){ if(restOrb){ ORBS[7].drawSprite(190, 92); } else { ORBS[1].drawSprite(190, 92); } } else { ORBS[14].drawSprite(190, 92); } ORBS[11].drawSprite(193, 95); if(energy != 100){ ORBS[0].drawSprite(193, 95); } ORBS[12].drawSprite(199, 100); } int Y = 117; if(is480){ Y = 120; } smallText.method382(getOrbTextColor(energy), 234, ""+energy, Y, true); }

Read full topic
